org.scotsbots.robot.utils

Class MathUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.scotsbots.robot.utils.MathUtils

  • public class MathUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Has a collection of math functions and constants. Originally adapted from Adambots code.
    Author:
    Ben - Modified by Domenic
